hero.title: We don't just grow your business -
animatedPhrases: We get you 40h back every month.
We do the work while you sleep.
hero.description: While your competitors juggle endless tasks, you focus on what actually generates revenue. I build the AI systems that handle the rest.
hero.secondaryButton: See how much I'm losing now

aiCentered.title: AI does all the {{everything}} for you.
aiCentered.subtitle: Your partner to become the leader who orchestrates instead of burning out.

aiJourney.header: How we save you {{transformation}} in 3 steps

steps.label: Audit
steps.title: We find where you're bleeding time
steps.subtitle: With a few quick consultations, we identify exactly where you're losing 40h+ monthly and how much it's costing in missed revenue

steps.label: Automation
steps.title: We build your AI systems
steps.subtitle: We develop tools and custom automations that do the work while you focus on paying clients

steps.label: Training
steps.title: Your team masters everything
steps.subtitle: We train your team to use the tools like pros. Result: your productivity triples without hiring

voiceAgentOffer.title: Your new 24/7 Receptionist
voiceAgentOffer.subtitle: Never miss a lead or appointment again—our AI handles it all.
voiceAgentOffer.description: Our AI agent automatically answers, qualifies hot leads, and books appointments on the spot. Say goodbye to missed opportunities and hello to more revenue—without lifting a finger.
voiceAgentOffer.offer: Win-win offer: pay a deposit to set up your custom agent, join a few quick training calls, provide feedback and a review, and we refund your ENTIRE deposit in credit — making your AI receptionist FREE.
voiceAgentOffer.limitation: Only 4 spots available this quarter—claim yours before they're gone!

whyWorkWithMe.title: Why I'm not like other consultants?
whyWorkWithMe.description: While traditional agencies bill you 120 hours for what can be done in 20, I build AI systems that work 24/7 while you do other things. No more bureaucratic theater or inflated billing. Just results that give you your freedom back.

projects.label: Saved per month for my clients

cta.title: In 5 years, there will be two types of entrepreneurs
cta.description: Those who orchestrate with AI... and those still burning out doing manually what a machine can do in 2 minutes.

servicesSection.title: Our quiet revolutions
servicesSection.subtitle: The ways we return your time, your calm, and your peace.

voiceagent.title: A voice that never sleeps
voiceagent.description: Your phone rings. A warm, intelligent voice answers, understands, qualifies, and books — all while you're in deep work or simply resting. Customers feel heard. You feel free.

contentAccelerator.title: From spark to finished pieces
contentAccelerator.description: Drop a raw idea into Notion. The AI enriches the outline, writes multiple drafts and suggests visuals. You refine, ship and it even improves overtime— never to start from zero.

automation.title: Invisible systems that run your business
automation.description: We find the loops that drain you — emails, scheduling, follow-ups, data entry — and replace them with intelligent automations that work perfectly, silently, forever.

chatAgent.title: Always there, never overwhelming
chatAgent.description: A conversation partner for your customers that feels human, remembers context, solves problems, and closes sales — 24 hours a day.

servicesSection.closingLine: Everything we build is designed to help you get back to doing what you love.
